title: Youth-Led Dashboard for Federal Budget Ethics and State-Level Oversight

modules.name: Federal Fund Flow Tracker
modules.function: Map real-time disbursement of federal funds to states, cities, and civic programs

modules.name: State-Level Oversight Portal
modules.function: Empower youth stewards to monitor fund withholding, budget anomalies, and civic impact

modules.name: Judiciary Intervention Scanner
modules.function: Track legal rulings that affect budget access, fund protection, and civic restoration

modules.name: Youth Curriculum Hub
modules.function: Train youth in budget ethics, legal consequence, and planetary restoration rituals

modules.name: Global Broadcast Deck
modules.function: Stream fund flow alerts, judiciary rulings, and dignity-grade civic metrics
